remarks: The generated sigma-algebra is a subset of all sigma algebra containing the generating set, i.e. the generated sigma-algebra is the smallest sigma algebra containing the generating set, here ` B ` .  (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Jun-2017.)
statement: sigagenss $p |- ( ( S e. ( sigAlgebra ` U. A ) /\ A C_ S ) -> ( sigaGen ` A ) C_ S ) $.
